attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Must match the name assigned to the children

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Mark the checkbox item as selected

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Content to display as the label for the Checkbox

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value binding to the checkbox

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description added below the label text

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Show an error on the checkbox item

attributes.name: ariaLabel
attributes.description: Defines how the text will be translated for the screen reader. If not specified it will fall back to the name
